coreAttributes.name: Automatic Laser Handgun
coreAttributes.description: It doesn't belong to this world, it belonged to a stranger who visited, pseudonymously known as The Rider. It seems he left it behind, every little thing about the handgun is unknown.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.name] [npc.verb(unload)] into [npc2.name], and send them sprawling to the ground, thankfully, the concussive bullets didn't cause any serious harm.
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(fire)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] ALH, [npc2.name] tries to move away, but you end up striking [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with concussive blast.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.name] [npc.verb(unload)] at [npc2.name] but drastically miss your target and the concussive bullets explode mid-air.
[npc.name] [npc.verb(Try)] to blast off at [npc2.name] but the ALH malfunctions!
